channel.title: Chat disappears and game crash
channel.description:
#### What happened? The game crashed while playing #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? play normal #### Steps to reproduce: just play the game #### Comments: my gf installed the game yesterday, and since then the game always crash. the chat disappears even at night and then a error show up. the game crashed 3 times, i am uploading all crashes, the 3rd its the more recent. uploading screenshots too.
*crash.dmp file has 0kb so i cant upload
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1b-N9tZ2QmYrx4VY_evf6pqaSgGqQTE1v

item.title: Chat disappears and game crash

item.description:
What happened?

The game crashed while playing

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

play normal

just play the game
